H0.text: What is the name of the life-size plastic dummies in the television series Doctor Who, the first of which arrived on Earth in hollow plastic meteorites with deadly weapons concealed in their hands. Androids

H1.text: What is the name of the life-size plastic dummies in the television series Doctor Who, the first of which arrived on Earth in hollow plastic meteorites with deadly weapons concealed in their hands. Plastoids

H2.text: What is the name of the life-size plastic dummies in the television series Doctor Who, the first of which arrived on Earth in hollow plastic meteorites with deadly weapons concealed in their hands. Cybermen

H3.text: What is the name of the life-size plastic dummies in the television series Doctor Who, the first of which arrived on Earth in hollow plastic meteorites with deadly weapons concealed in their hands. Auton

A4.text: The Autons are killer plastic automatons which act as human duplicates and shop-window mannequins.

A5.text: Spearhead from Space is the first Doctor Who serial to feature the Autons.
